content: **crocheted bag in drops paris the piece is worked in squares ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern w-901 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **size** height without strap approx 21 cm width approx 21 cm length of strap approx 50 cm **yarn** drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 100 g 17 off white 50 g 30 jeans blue 50 g 29 ice blue 50 g 67 wheat 50 g 68 almond 50 g 44 brown **crochet hook** drops crochet hook size 5 mm crochet gauge 14 treble crochets in width and 8 5 row in height = 10 x 10 cm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
